QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select cast(replace(v.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, v.ptid, v.visitid, v.visit_type, v.visit_start_date, v.visit_end_date, v.visit_start_time, v.visit_end_time, e.encid, ec.provid, cast(replace(e.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) as VisitOccurrenceId, row_number() over (partition by v.visitid order by e.interaction_date) as ordinal, v.discharge_disposition, v.admission_source, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by e.encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role, specialty) sort_index from {sc}.visit v JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND v.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE join {sc}.encounter e on v.visitid = e.visitid LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = e.encid LEFT JOIN {sc}.provider p on p.provid = ec.provid where e.encid is not null and e.encid != '' )
select PersonId, visit_start_date, visit_end_date, visit_start_time, visit_end_time, encid, provid, VisitOccurrenceId, discharge_disposition, admission_source, visit_type, case when visit_type = 'Inpatient' then 9201 when visit_type = 'Emergency patient' then 9203 when visit_type = 'Observation patient' then 9201 ELSE 0 end as conceptId from a where ordinal = 1 and sort_index = 1 order by PersonId
